name: Sindhu Lim
body:
Hi,
am wondering how you managed to connect the sennheiser mke 400 to your iPhone. Do you need a special adaptor cable? Hope to hear from you and thanks in advance.

Rgds
Sindhu

name: tracey pooh
body:
hi there! sorry somehow missed this until now…
it was just a direct connection w/ the normal headphones/mic cable, very simple!
hope that helps! 🙂
